Deathtouch
When Corpsecaster Mage enters, if you cast it, target creature card in your graveyard gains arise until end of turn. Its arise cost is equal to its mana cost. [i](Exile that card from your graveyard and pay its arise cost: Create a token that's a copy of it except it's a black Zombie in addition to its other types, has no mana cost, and can't block. Arise only as a sorcery.)[/i]
